structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. COMMUNITY ANTENNA TELEVISION SYSTEMS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-130. Service charges.
The rates charged by the Licensee shall be filed annually with the County Manager. No increase in established rates by the Licensee shall become effective until at least thirty (30) days' written notice is given to the Miami-Dade County Manager and to all customers served by the Licensee. The Licensee may at any time reduce the established rate.
